meanings.sent1: The flag on the pole was raiseable.
meanings.sent2: The shelf was designed to be raiseable for easy access.
meanings.sent3: The raiseable balloon floated gently in the sky.
meanings.sent4: Her spirits were raiseable after receiving good news.
meanings.sent5: The raiseable platform allowed workers to reach higher areas safely.

meanings.definition: Able to be lifted or elevated.
meanings.sent1: The raiseable window allowed fresh air to enter the room.
meanings.sent2: The raiseable seat in the car provided extra comfort.
meanings.sent3: The raiseable toy airplane soared through the air.
meanings.sent4: His raiseable spirits lifted the mood of the entire team.
meanings.sent5: The raiseable bridge allowed ships to pass underneath.

meanings.definition: Suitable for increasing in amount or level.
meanings.sent1: Investing in stocks can be raiseable for your savings.
meanings.sent2: The raiseable salary motivated employees to work harder.
meanings.sent3: The raiseable cake made everyone smile at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her raiseable energy levels kept her going throughout the day.
meanings.sent5: The raiseable demand for the product led to increased production.
